short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help you identify accessibility issues on your website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ensure your website is accessible to everyone! The A11y Spotlight Chrome extension helps developers quickly identify and fix common accessibility issues on any webpage. With just a click, it runs an automatic audit to detect problems like missing alt text, poor color contrast, and more.

Key Features:
	•	Automatic accessibility audits when the extension is opened
	•	Detailed issue breakdown by severity (critical, serious, moderate, minor)
	•	Visual highlights for problematic elements directly on the webpage
	•	Easy navigation through each issue instance using a built-in slider
	•	No data collection — all analysis is performed locally within the browser

Make your website more inclusive by ensuring it meets accessibility standards with this easy-to-use tool.
